page.title: 13A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: On a typical Sunday 25% of {fathers } were{at work.}28 out of 100 found time to do{D.I.Y. }work in and around the house.21% spent some of their time{ {gardening }and 1 in 4 spent some time cleaning or maintaining cars.Just over one_third enjoyed some time on a Sunday in a{pub or club. } 19% of fathers enjoyed time at a{ {hobby. }11% of these were involved in a sporting activity.39% of the fathers in the sample preferred to "relax most of the time in the house"on a Sunday. 48% of{mothers }spent Sunday afternoon at{housework.}A further 21% spent time {preparing food.}25% of mothers spent Sunday afternoon watching television. Others in the sample were involved with pastimes or visiting. Only 14% of parents went on an{outing or visit {with their children.
